comments:
build i1117

I was editing the plugin.properties file for the resources plug-in and I tried
to save but I got this error. Editing and saving with the text editor works OK.

Who owns the properties file editor? Isn't it the Platform/UI team? Its
definately not the Platform/Resources team....what's an editor? :-)

The last time such an error occurred John claimed it was a problem in the job
manager.  And no, we do not own this editor.  It is provided by JDT I believe.  

Care to comment John?
Moving to the text component (text component owns the text editors, not JDT).
Just to have the last word: Kim was right as well: it's JDT Text ;-)
